DIA_Lena_Helpme_16_01: Just go! You're not supposed to talk to me!
DIA_Lena_SQ316_YouAreFree_03_02: I don't know who you are, but thank you.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_YouAreFree_15_03: Your mother is still looking for you, I'll take you to her.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_YouAreFree_03_04: I'm glad she hasn't lost hope yet.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_YouAreFree_03_05: I'm weak, but maybe I can keep up with you. Lead the way!
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_15_01: There must be some way to get you out of here...
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_03_02: So they could track me down later and kill me? Or worse, do something to my mother?
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_03_03: I don't want to live in constant fear. The most important thing is that I got away from those abusers.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_03_04: Tell my mother I'm alive and well.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_03_05: Give her this amulet. She gave it to me once, she'll recognize it without a problem.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_15_01: Yes, Cortez is dead. This is the end of the Haven.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_15_02: Lena, it's time for you to go back to your mother.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_05: My name is Lena and I have been forcibly taken to this place!
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_06: People in guard armour kept me in a cage like some kind of animal.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_07: Cortez didn't like that. One day he came with his men and forced my tormentors to give me back my freedom. Unfortunately, it was a false freedom - I couldn't go outside the Haven!
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_08: But now that Cortez is dead, I must go back to my mother as soon as possible!
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_10: Yes, and why do you ask?
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_12: I'm Lena, why do you ask?
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_15_13: Your mother is looking for you, you should come back to town with me.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_CortezIsDead_03_14: I was afraid to do anything because of the chaos... Could you escort me to the city? I don't want anything to get in my way.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_Rune_15_01: Maybe you want to use a teleportation rune to get home?
DIA_Lena_SQ507_Rune_03_02: No way! I've heard stories of people who have failed at teleportation.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_Rune_03_03: I don't want to end up like a blood stain!
DIA_Lena_SQ507_NewWeapon_03_01: Before we move on, I have a request to you...
DIA_Lena_SQ507_NewWeapon_03_03: I'd feel more secure if I had at least a stick to hit those swamp monsters in the head.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_GiveWeapon_03_02: Hmm, I guess that'll have to do.
DIA_Lena_SQ507_GiveWeapon_NoWeapon_15_01: I don't think I have any extra weapons.
DIA_Lena_SQ316_WayToGetYouOut_Choice: There must be some way to get you out of here...
